summary: Enchanting is overpowerd in Skyrim. These two separate plugins make changes to Enchanting Perks and Item Enchanting to address that.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][color=#ffcc66]====================[/color][/size]
[size=6] [color=#66ccff] [b] ENCHANT ME NOT [/b] [/color] [/size]
[size=6][color=#ffcc66]====================[/color][/size]

[b]These two separate plugins make changes to Enchanting Perks and Item Enchanting to make enchanting less overpowerd.[/b]

[size=3][color=#ffcc66] [b]  Other mods by bootliquor:[/color][/size]
[size=3][color=#66ccff] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8029] Darwins Nightmare[/url][/color][color=#cc6699] - The ultimate hardcore realism and survival experience. [/color][/size]
[size=3][color=#66ccff] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8363] Sacred Stones [/url][/color][color=#cc6699] - Overhauls shrine and standing stone buffs to be more useful, better balanced, and less overpowered.[/color][/size]
[size=3][color=#66ccff] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8029] Enchant Me Not [/url][/color][color=#cc6699] - An overhaul of Enchanting perks and Item Enchanting. [/color][/size]
[size=3][color=#66ccff] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8029] KoS - Alternate Adventures [/url][/color][color=#cc6699] Play against all of skyrim that was once your friend. Faction changes make you kill on sight.[/b] [/color][/size]

Install one or both into Skyrim/Data. 

[size=3][color=#66ccff] [b] Enchant Me Items[/b] [/color][/size]
This reworks item enchanting to make it less overpowered. It completely overhauls which enchantments can go on which item type to prevent overstacking of enchantments and creating an overpowered character.

[size=3][color=#66ccff] [b] Enchant Me Perks[/b] [/color][/size]
Reworks the Enchanting perk tree to make it less overpowered and give some other interesting benefits.


[size=3][color=#66ccff] [b] Item Enchanting Changes[/b] [/color][/size]
[img]http://home.ms.metrocast.net/~blano1/enchant_items.jpg[/img]

[size=3][color=#66ccff] [b] Perk Tree Changes[/b] [/color][/size]
[img]http://home.ms.metrocast.net/~blano1/enchant_perks.jpg[/img]
author: bootliquor
